articles.title: New Ebola outbreak in DR Congo suspected of causing 15 deaths - CNN
articles.description: A new Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo is suspected of causing 15 deaths among 28 people with symptoms, the health ministry in the central African country said Thursday.
articles.content:
A new Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of Congo is suspected of causing 15 deaths among 28 people with symptoms, the health ministry in the central African country said Thursday.

articles.author: Daisy Dobrijevic
articles.title: Where to see the blood moon lunar eclipse Sept. 7–8 - Space
articles.description: The September 2025 total lunar eclipse will bring a blood-red moon to skies across Asia, Australia, Africa and Europe — if you know where to look.
articles.content:
The second total lunar eclipse of 2025 will transform the full moon into a coppery-red "blood moon" on the night of Sept. 7–8.
This long-lasting, impressive eclipse is visible to billions worldwide,… [+2600 chars]
